name: One Lit Candle
description:
In darkness
With only
One lit candle
This room
Is dark
Only one flickering candle

FEATURES:
- 207 words
- Kinetic visual novel style in NVL format
- One lit candle
- Author's notes

One Lit Candle is a foreboding poem about being alone in a dark room with only a single candle slowly melting away. The atmosphere is eerie, ominous, with a vague hope. But perhaps that will be enough to dispel the darkness.
